message: Bob, let's start with a reasonable split. I propose I take $60 and you take $40. It's a good deal for the first round!
Let's try a bit more even split, considering the inflation, 55-45 seems fair for both of us.
Bob, time is ticking and the money is losing value. I'll take a little less this round and accept your previous offer, but let's close the deal now.
I understand the pressure of inflation, but I still think I can get a bit more. 58-42 is my new proposal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We're losing money with every passing round. Let's split it evenly and end this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
